definitions.body: [[חֲשַׁבְיׇהוּ]] a temple musician 1Ch 25:3 = [[חֲשַׁבְיׇה]] v:1Ch 25:19; LXX in both Asabia.
[[חֲשַׁבְיׇה]] a Levite, David's time 1Ch 27:17; perh. = [[חֲשַׁבְיׇהוּ]], officer of David in Hebron 1Ch 26:30; in both LXX Asabiav.
[[חֲשַׁבְיׇהוּ]] a Levite, Josiah's time 2Ch 35:9; LXX Asabia. Elsewhere [[חשׁביה]]:
Levite in line of Merari 1Ch 6:30 LXX Aseb(e)i, Asabia.
Levite 1Ch 9:14, LXX Asabia = Ne 11:15, A LXXL Asabiou[av]
Levite, Ezra's time Ezr 8:19, Ezr 8:24, Ne 10:12, Ne 11:22, Ne 12:24 (LXX Asabiav etc.) = [[חֲשַׁבְנְיׇה]]
head of a family of priests Ne 12:21, LXX Asabiav.
a builder at the wall Ne 3:17, LXX Asabia(v).
